## ObjectStateType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ObjectStateType<
  Ds extends Record<string, StateType>
> = StateType<
  StateTypesSerializedType<Ds>,
  StateTypesValueType<Ds>,
  StateTypesReturnType<Ds>
>
```
